period: Period of the game that the the event described in that row actually occurred.
away_score: Accumulated score of away team at that moment in the game
home_score: Accumulated score of home team at that moment in the game
elapsed: Time passed since the period has started.
play_length: Duration of the event described in that row.
play_id: All events in a game has an id number
team: The team that has executed the described event
event_type: Various types of events (fouls, freethrows, turnovers etc.)
assist: The player who made the assist if the event is an assisted field goal.
away: Player of away team who is participating in a jumpball
home: Player of home team who is participating in a jumpball
entered: Player who checks in the game
left: Player who checks out the game
num: Freethrows in an order (first, second, third...)
opponent: Player who has drawn a foul.
outof: How many free throws are going to be shoot
possession: Player who grabbed the ball after an event.
reason: More details on how the event happened
type: Various types of events occurs in a game
original_x: X axis value of the shot
original_y: Y axis value of the shot
converted_x:
X axis value converted to X coordinate on an standard NBA court 
(94 feet long and 50 feet wide)
converted_y:
Y axis value converted to Y coordinate on an standard NBA court 
(94 feet long and 50 feet wide)
